Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: You've got other places to be.

Children.Title: Plan ahead
Children.Tooltip: Spend some quiet time with a drink and review your findings.

ScriptAction.Script:
Log("MQ03_TAVERN_EVENT3")

-- Set up context for the pred
MQ03_SetupAssailantContext()

ScriptAppear.Script:
-- Player swallowed Sahro during MQ02
return Storage.GetFlag("MQ02_RANDALL_TIGRESS_EATEN")

Children.Title: Why
Children.Tooltip: Ask what they want with you.

Children.Title: Who
Children.Tooltip: Ask who they are.

Children.Title: Resist
Children.Tooltip: You're not going down without a fight!

ScriptAction.Script:
Text.SetVariable("boy", Player.Gender == EGender.Male and "boy" or "girl")
Log("MQ03_TAVERN_EVENT4_HIT")

Text.SetVariable("boy", Player.Gender == EGender.Male and "boy" or "girl")
Log("MQ03_TAVERN_EVENT4_DEFAULT")

Children.Title: Zosk
Children.Tooltip: Speak to the merchant - you have need of him.

Children.Title: Cart
Children.Tooltip: Ask where his carriage is.

Children.Title: Continue
Children.Tooltip: This fellow does not seem like much for conversation right now.

Children.Title: Leave
Children.Tooltip: Use the opportunity to secure your ride.

Children.Title: Red Maw
Children.Tooltip: Ask where the Red Maw is, and what he knows about it.

Children.Title: Cargo
Children.Tooltip: Ask what he is transporting currently.

Children.Title: Ride
Children.Tooltip: Ask if you can hitch a ride.

Children.Title: Talk
Children.Tooltip: Chat up Holly, the bartender.

Nodes.Comment: Allow showing hello message by default
Don't show post-tavern event text if post-temple is shown first

Children.Title: Predator
Children.Tooltip: Say that you were accosted by someone who tried to eat you!

Children.Title: Red Maw
Children.Tooltip: Say that you're on the run from a gang of murderous predators.

Children.Title: Iso
Children.Tooltip: Say that you got attacked by the people Mayor Iso is running from, too.

Nodes.Comment: Skip 'hello' message if interrupt conversations were shown

MainSubgroup.Comment: Show different/longer text on first visit

Children.Title: Never mind
Children.Tooltip: Time to go.

Children.Title: Iso
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the missing mayor.

Children.Title: Neutral
Children.Tooltip: Explain that she has not been seen since a strange incident.

Children.Title: Concerned
Children.Tooltip: Explain that, with missing persons, every second counts.

Children.Title: Dismissive
Children.Tooltip: Explain that the Acting Mayor instructed you to find her.

Children.Title: Bridge
Children.Tooltip: Ask about how South Finmer dealt with the broken bridge.

Children.Title: Recruitment
Children.Tooltip: Ask about the mysterious job offers going around.

Children.Title: Rumors
Children.Tooltip: Chat about some recent happenings.

Children.Title: Bed
Children.Tooltip: Ask if there's a room available for the night.

Children.Title: Private Room
Children.Tooltip: Keep asking about private rooms or sleeping places.

ScriptAction.Script:
if Storage.GetFlag("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO4") then
    -- No text; transition to main event scene
    Storage.SetFlag("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO_DONE", true)

elseif Storage.GetFlag("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO3") then
    Log("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO4")
    Storage.SetFlag("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO4", true)

elseif Storage.GetFlag("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO2") then
    Log("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO3")
    Storage.SetFlag("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO3", true)

elseif Storage.GetFlag("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO1") then
    Log("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO2")
    Storage.SetFlag("PORT_EVENT_TAURDINING_INTRO2", true)
end

Children.Title: Safety
Children.Tooltip: Ask if this idea is even safe!

Children.Title: Struggle
Children.Tooltip: Having second thoughts?

Children.Title: Submit
Children.Tooltip: It's your very own private room - one that you asked for.

Children.Title: Struggle
Children.Tooltip: Maybe, just maybe, you could wake her up.

Children.Title: Submit
Children.Tooltip: Make the best of a bad situation.
